topic.title: EMS Procedures Performed Section - conformance rules

lines.i: Information regarding procedures performed by the EMS personnel or by others prior to EMS unit arrival

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.21"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10490)/@code="29554-3" Procedure Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10489)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Procedures Performed" (CONF:10492)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry (CONF:6277)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.181)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10490)/@code="29554-3" Procedure Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10489)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Procedures Performed" (CONF:10492)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry (CONF:6277)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.181)
